name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Skilled Software Developer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering robust backend systems, particularly in financial platforms. Proficient in **.NET Core**, **C#**, **SQL Server**, **Web Services**, **.NET Framework**, **MVC**, and **Entity Framework**. Demonstrated ability to create efficient and scalable services, while showcasing strong problem-solving capabilities and exceptional organizational skills. Recognized for attention to detail and effective time management, contributing to successful projects at leading organizations, including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.

experience.responsibilities:
- Developed scalable web services using **.NET Core** and **C#**, implementing efficient architecture to enhance application performance.
- Designed and maintained databases with **SQL Server** to optimize data retrieval and storage, achieving query performance improvements of up to **30%**.
- Utilized **Entity Framework** for data manipulation and ensured smooth CRUD operations while adhering to best practices in **MVC** framework design.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams, applying strong **problem-solving** abilities in order to resolve integration challenges and deliver timely project milestones.
- Demonstrated effective **time management** and **organizational skills** by prioritizing tasks and handling multiple projects simultaneously, meeting **100%** of deadlines.
- Ensured a high standard of **attention to detail** in code reviews and testing processes, leading to a decrease in post-release defects by **40%**.

Developed backend systems using **.NET Core** and **C#** to create scalable web services that streamline user onboarding and manage complex reporting processes.
Engineered database solutions and optimized SQL queries in **SQL Server** to enhance performance and reliability across applications.
Implemented web application design patterns with **MVC** and data access strategies through **Entity Framework** to improve code maintainability and efficiency.
Managed the deployment and integration of services, ensuring adherence to organizational standards and enhancing overall organizational skills and time management.
Applied strong problem-solving skills to troubleshoot and resolve technical challenges, enhancing application performance by **30%**.
Conducted thorough testing and code reviews, improving attention to detail and ensuring compliance with best practices before every release.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure successful integration of new features while maintaining regulatory compliance.

• Developed robust backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking utilizing **Python**, **Flask**, and **PostgreSQL**, enhancing trading operations by up to **25%**.
• Engineered high-performance real-time price feed processors employing **asyncio**, **WebSockets**, and **Redis**, delivering up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions with latency reduced to **50ms**.
• Collaborated closely with frontend teams to facilitate seamless data delivery via REST APIs and WebSocket channels, ensuring efficient user interaction with the platform, achieving user satisfaction scores above **90%**.
• Ensured compliance with regulatory requirements including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while implementing internal data security protocols to safeguard sensitive information.
• Implemented comprehensive test suites leveraging **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers, streamlining QA and CI processes and reducing bugs in production by **30%**.
• Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions powered by **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and enhancing process management efficiency.
